meanings.definition: The quality of being great; distinguished or eminent.
meanings.sent1: Her kindness and generosity truly show her greatness.
meanings.sent2: His greatness as a leader was evident in times of crisis.
meanings.sent3: The cat's attempt to climb the curtains was a display of feline greatness.
meanings.sent4: The sun's brightness paled in comparison to the greatness of the full moon.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the essence of greatness in his masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being great; magnitude.
meanings.sent1: The greatness of the mountain range took their breath away.
meanings.sent2: The greatness of the task ahead seemed daunting but achievable.
meanings.sent3: The toddler's attempt to lift the heavy box was a comical display of greatness.
meanings.sent4: The greatness of the storm was felt in every gust of wind.
meanings.sent5: The greatness of the ocean's expanse was both beautiful and intimidating.

meanings.definition: The quality of being considerably above average.
meanings.sent1: His greatness in academics earned him a scholarship.
meanings.sent2: The team's greatness on the field led them to victory.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's ability to find acorns with such speed was a display of greatness.
meanings.sent4: The greatness of her cooking skills was evident in every delicious meal.
meanings.sent5: The greatness of the singer's voice left the audience in awe.
